title: Phyllotaxis
description: In this coding challenge, I continue one of my favorite subjects: Algorithmic botany! This video covers the subject of Phyllotaxis, what it is and how it can be used to generate sunflower-like patterns inspired by nature.

timestamps.title: Add a dot with a specific angle and radius
Add formula for polar to cartesian coordinates
Change the angle to render different patterns
Cycle through the colors using modulus

codeExamples.title: Phyllotaxis
codeExamples.description: This sketch generates a sunflower-like pattern using algorithmic botony.
